title: S'more Pie
instructions: Mix graham cracker crumbs, sugar, and butter. Press into 9-inch pie pan. Bake at 350Â° for 10 minutes. Cool. For filling: Heat cream until simmering. Pour over chocolate chips. Let stand 5 minutes, then stir until smooth. Add vanilla. Pour into crust. Refrigerate 2 hours. Top with marshmallows. Broil 1-2 minutes until marshmallows are toasted (watch carefully!). Garnish with graham cracker pieces.
